snippet: With the confirmation that a British surgeon in a Syrian prison had died, his family on accused British authorities of failing to protect him.
lead_paragraph: With the confirmation that a British surgeon in a Syrian prison had died, his family on accused British authorities of failing to protect him.

headline.main: Syria Confirms British Surgeon Died in Prison, but Calls it Suicide
